name: Marvel Interactions Tree
description:
This is a Marvel Interactions Tree application, where the different characters are connected if they have met though 1v1 fighting or talking. Not all characters are included, only main plot characters and of course the Marvel pets.

This is also only with shows and movies from the main MCU timeline and doesn't include characters from other Marvel projects, until they have appeared in the MCU. (Example: "Peter Parker (Rami)" knows "Mary Jane Watson", but "Mary Jane Watson" hasn't appeared in the MCU.)

This map is updated 02.08.2022 with Thor: Love and Thunder, and Ms. Marvel.
